public_page_aboutUs_headerDesc: Provides information about our company's history, mission, vision, values, team and our industry in general.
public_page_checkout_details_orderThanks: Thank you for choosing us for your shopping :)
public_page_checkout_header: Your order has been created successfully
public_page_checkout_title: All necessary details have been sent to your email address!
public_page_faqs_headerDesc: You can review the most frequently asked questions and answers here.
public_page_faqs_question_1: When will my order be shipped?
public_page_faqs_answer_1: Your order is usually shipped within 1-2 business days after payment is confirmed.
public_page_faqs_question_2: When will my order be delivered?
public_page_faqs_answer_2: After being shipped, delivery time usually takes 1-5 business days, depending on your region.
public_page_faqs_question_3: Which courier companies do you work with?
public_page_faqs_answer_3: You can choose from one of the listed courier companies to ship your order.
public_page_faqs_question_4: How does the return process work?
public_page_faqs_answer_4: You can request a return within 14 days of receiving the product. Simply contact customer service for assistance.
public_page_faqs_answer_5: You can pay via Cash on Delivery, Credit Card, Bank Card, or Wire Transfer/EFT.
public_page_faqs_question_6: How can I track my order?
public_page_faqs_answer_6: You can track your order through your account under the 'My Orders' section or use the tracking number provided to you.
public_page_faqs_question_7: How can I learn about discounts and promotions?
public_page_faqs_answer_7: You can subscribe to our email newsletter or follow us on social media to stay updated on the latest promotions and discounts.
public_page_faqs_answer_8: Your invoice will either be included with your package or sent to your email address electronically.
public_page_faqs_answer_9: Currently, we only ship within Turkey.
public_page_faqs_question_10: How can I cancel my order?
public_page_faqs_answer_10: You can cancel your order within 3 hours from the 'My Orders' section, or contact customer service for later cancellations.
public_page_faqs_question_11: How can I reach customer service?
public_page_faqs_answer_11: You can contact our customer service team through the 'Contact Us' page or by calling.
public_page_faqs_question_12: Is there a warranty on your products?
public_page_faqs_answer_12: Yes, all of our products come with a standard 1-year warranty.
public_page_feature_integration_title: Our integration services work in harmony with the industry's best service providers to accelerate your business processes and increase your efficiency
public_page_feature_main_header: Up-to-date security standards, high-performance infrastructure and powerful integration
public_page_feature_mobile_title: Enjoy shopping anywhere! Thanks to our mobile compatible e-commerce infrastructure, you can shop fast, secure and easy from your mobile phone or tablet
public_page_feature_performance_title: Our website offers an uninterrupted shopping experience with high performance and fast opening times
public_page_feature_security_title: All your e-commerce transactions are protected by the latest security standards, your personal data and payment information are not stored by us. They are stored by companies whose job it is to protect them
public_page_featuredTestimonial_body: I have been looking for a reliable wholesaler for a long time. I did not think I would find such an advantageous place both in terms of product variety and prices. Now both my customers are satisfied and my profit margin has increased
public_page_operations_orders_title: Check the status of recent orders, manage returns, and discover similar products
public_page_payment_headerDesc: Our customers who do not want to use a credit card or who want to pay directly at a discount can make their payments directly to us through the payment channels specified below.
public_page_payment_notification: Get in touch before completing the checkout process!
public_page_teamSection_title: Weâ€™re a dynamic group of individuals who are passionate about what we do and dedicated to delivering the best results for our clients
public_page_testimonial_body_title: Meet countless people satisfied with our service
public_page_testimonial_body_1: I placed my first order with some hesitation, but the products were of better quality than I expected and the prices are really below the market. I don't think I will shop anywhere else anymore
public_page_testimonial_body_2: At first I just wanted to try it out, I honestly didn't expect much. But as I used it, I realized that everything was thought out. Details that make my work easier, fast feedback... Now I say I'm glad I tried it
public_page_testimonial_body_3: Sometimes you buy something and then you wish you had met him before... That's exactly what happened. It saved me a lot of time and put my mind at ease
public_page_testimonial_body_4: I was a bit hesitant at first, but the team's approach, interest and solution-oriented attitude impressed me a lot. Now I recommend it to everyone around me at every opportunity
public_page_testimonial_body_5: Everything went so smoothly... Whenever I had a problem, they found a solution instantly. This kind of attention is very rare now
public_page_testimonial_body_6: I placed my first order with some hesitation, but the products were of better quality than I expected and the prices are really below the market. I don't think I will shop anywhere else anymore
public_page_testimonial_body_7: As a wholesaler, both reasonable prices and fast delivery are very important. I found both here. My orders arrive in full and the prices are easy on my pocket.
public_page_testimonial_body_8: I had difficulty finding the products I was looking for elsewhere. Here I found both a wide range of products and very reasonable prices. Such a combination is rare
public_page_testimonial_body_9: I have been in this industry for many years, I have worked with many suppliers, but this is the first time I have seen such an affordable price and such a quality of service. They really make my work very easy
public_page_testimonial_body_10: I've been in this industry for years, I've worked with countless suppliers, but I've never seen a place that has been around for so long and still offers such reasonable prices. The products are of high quality, the deliveries are fast, and the prices are unbeatable
